citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 A.M. on
22-AUG-17.
Telephone calls were made to the contact numbers at 10:55 AM. Inspector waited until 11:30 AM at the facility and
then left. Telephone calls were not returned.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 A.M. on
22-AUG-17.
Telephone calls were made to the contact numbers at 10:55 AM.  Inspector waited until 11:30 AM at the facility and
then left.  Telephone calls were not returned.
